DescriptionData.Title: CO2 Refills (12/Pack)
DescriptionData.Description: 12 pack of 8 gram size CO2 cartridges, for use with Confetti Launcher. Please note: CO2 cartridges can NOT be shipped via Air, they must ship via Ground.

DescriptionData.Title: Circle To Square Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: Scientists say that it is impossible to square the circle. Yet, that is exactly what you do in this clever trick. A large hoop of steel is shown --- it is a complete, unbroken circle. Without any cover, instantly, the circle changes into a large square! Startling and amazing. The ring is about 10" in diameter, made entirely of chrome plated steel!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Circle to square magic trick kit

DescriptionData.Title: Spring Flowers Magic Trick - Medium
DescriptionData.Description:
These brightly colored bouquets of paper flowers pack flat, and can be produced instantly from almost anywhere! The effect is that the flowers seem to appear from nowhere; they can be hidden in a production box, a book, up your sleeve, etc. Spring Flowers require no skill to use and can be folded back up and used over and over.
These Spring Flowers includes 6 blossoms, all tied together to make a bouquet. Each 3.75 inch long blossom is constructed on a spring, so it pops open to about an 8 inch bouquet when released. Fold them up, and hide them wherever you like - up your sleeve, in a dove pan or in some other magical device (not included). If necessary, secure the flowers so they don't open early, small binder clips work very well for this purpose.
You get one set of Spring Flowers (individual blooms on string) made of paper. You supply the method of producing the flower bouquet.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Bouquet opens to about 8 inches in diameter

DescriptionData.Title: Spring Bills Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: This bouquet of realistic imitation bills packs flat, and can be produced from almost anywhere!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Realistic bouquet of ten dollar bills

DescriptionData.Title: Sponge Balls - 1 Inch (4/Pack)
DescriptionData.Description: These soft sponge balls are easy to vanish. The 1 inch ball can be placed inside a thumbtip! Check out the video 25 Amazing Tricks with Sponge Balls (see below). 4 per pack.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Can be placed into a thumb tip

DescriptionData.Title: Sponge Balls - 7/8 inch (8/Pack)
DescriptionData.Description: These soft sponge balls are easy to vanish. The 1 inch ball can be placed inside a thumbtip! Check out the video 25 Amazing Tricks with Sponge Balls (see below). 8 per pack.

DescriptionData.Title: Jumbo 3-D Foam Bunny
DescriptionData.Description: A 5 inch long, 3-dimensional bunny painted off-white with spots. Still with squishable foam, but even cuter! Makes a great production item.

DescriptionData.Title: Slush Powder Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: A small amount of this non-toxic super absorbent powder will turn liquids into a solid goo. Pour some water into a glass, cover it for a second and when uncovered, the water appears to have frozen! The glass can even be turned upside down and the water stays in it. Approximately 3 oz.

DescriptionData.Title: Wizard Blizzard Snowstorm
DescriptionData.Description:
Includes a dozen snowstorm pellets that transform into snow, you supply the rest.
There are lots of ways to use this, for example: tear a piece of paper into tiny bits, then wet it with water (palm the wet paper and replace with a snowstorm pellet). Then use a folding fan to "dry" the wet pieces, and hundreds of flakes fill the air, resembling a raging snowstorm! Some minor sleight of hand needed, so practice, practice, practice!
Packs of 12. Use with an ordinary folding fan, or extend the routing using with Break Away Fan.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Pellets of paper flakes transform into whirling snow

DescriptionData.Title: Six Bill Repeat Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: You count out your money, which happens to be six $50 bills. With growing amazement, you tell a story of how you sold your old clown car for $300 and a good luck charm, and the charm really works, because this money never seems to run out! You relate how you bought a new pair of clown shoes for $150 (count 3 bills and set aside) but when you counted it, the money was still there! (Count out six bills again) Then you bought a new outfit..., a new watch..., and your money was still all there. Each time you count off 3 bills, and six remain!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Six bill repeat magic trick kit

DescriptionData.Title: Yellow Magic Silks (6 Inch)
DescriptionData.Description: These are good quality, extremely crushable woven 100% silks from magic by Gosh. Measures 6 inches diagonally.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Good quality, extremely crushable woven 100% silk

DescriptionData.Title: 20th Century Silks (18 Inch)
DescriptionData.Description: Two colored silks are tied together and held by a spectator. A third silk is vanished into a Thumbtip, Change Bag, Popcorn Dye Box, etc.. The third silk then appears securely tied between the other two. Assorted colors.

DescriptionData.Title: Thumbtip Streamers (1" x 64") (2/Pack)
DescriptionData.Description: Long silk streamers that appear to go on forever as you pull them from your hat, your hand, or almost anyplace! Thumbtips not included.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Long silk streamers that appear to go on forever

DescriptionData.Title: Thumbtip Streamers (1" x 34") (2/Pack)
DescriptionData.Description: Long silk streamers that appear to go on forever as you pull them from your hat, your hand, or almost anyplace!

DescriptionData.Title: Mismade Thank You Silk Set (18 Inch)
DescriptionData.Description: Mismade Thank You Set includes 18 inch Mismade Thank You AND 18 inch "Thank you" silk, plus routine by Ickle Pickle. Solid black and yellow silks available separately (see below).
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes 18" mismade thank you silk and 18" thank you silk plus a routine
Solid black and yellow silks sold separately

DescriptionData.Title: Santa in the Chimney Silk Routine
DescriptionData.Description: This occupies no space but works great! Includes a large decorated house silk and a smaller Santa silk. Ideal for a beautiful routine in silks. The Santa vanishes into the chimney but where? Maybe he got stuck! Magically, you pull him out but he's covered in soot! And where are the gifts? They're in the bag that you showed empty before you started. This can be done your way, using thumbtips, change bag, etc. An online demonstration video makes it easier!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Ideal for a beautiful routine in silks.
It occupies no space but plays great!
Includes a large decorated house silk and a smaller Santa silk.

DescriptionData.Title: Rabbit & Hat Silks (9 inches)
DescriptionData.Description: Two colorful, nine inch silks with a top hat and starburst on them, one features an adorable bunny popping out of the hat! Use with any size Change Bag or the Popcorn Dye Box.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: One features a top hat and star burst, the other an adorable bunny

DescriptionData.Title: Popcorn Dye Magic Box
DescriptionData.Description: This great utility item has so many uses. A cardboard popcorn box is shown empty. Suddenly, silks are magically produced from it! It can also be used to vanish silks or make them change color. Other small items can also be used in the box. The perfect vanish for (20th Century Silks).
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Magic item disappearing and re-appearing popcorn box

DescriptionData.Title: Egg Nest Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: This colorful and eye-catching trick makes a great impact - everyone likes to the chance to win something for free! Show your audience five colorful plastic Easter eggs, and slip a gold coin, dollar bill or a ring into the one of the eggs (without showing which color egg has the item). Four people are invited to reach into the bag without looking and remove an egg, and you take the last egg. Of course the egg left for you is the one with the the valuables! Also a great way to give something special to the birthday child. Directions and ideas included. Very easy to do. Need some (Silly Rings)?

DescriptionData.Title: Tote Smiley Change Bags
DescriptionData.Description: The Smiley Switch Bag by Sam Tee. These flat, colorful change bags are perfect for many silk changes (available on the (silks page)) or vanishes. Smiley Tote is approx. 9.5" tall x 8" wide;

DescriptionData.Title: Itty Bitty Change Bags
DescriptionData.Description: The Itty Bitty is our smallest traditional change bag. Just like our larger change bags, this wood handled velvet pouched bag is large enough to hold a silver dollar, small to medium silks, a mouthcoil, or a host of other small items you can find on our (Pocket Magic) page. Assorted colors, by Ickle Pickle.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Large enough to hold a silver dollar, small to medium silks, a mouth coil, or other small items
